content: With it being given to you at the beginning of Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain, you can't craft it. However, it can be crafted into a variety of other weapons as you progress.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Willow_Wood_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Willow Wood Staff'.
The content is as follows:
With it being given to you at the beginning of Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain, you can't craft it. However, it can be crafted into a variety of other weapons as you progress.
